name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Justin HEARD, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Justin HEARD, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of July, 2015, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Petitioner is DIRECTED to file his Petition for Allowance of Appeal within thirty days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
118 A.3d 1105
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Justin HEARD, Petitioner.
No. 58 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 8, 2015.
